videos.description: John Konchar makes a wide open 3-point shot to give Fort Wayne a lead over No. 8 Kentucky in the first half.
videos.headline: Fort Wayne takes lead over Kentucky with 3-pointer

videos.description: John Konchar beats the shot clock with a 3-ball that gives Fort Wayne the lead over Kentucky.
videos.headline: Konchar makes another 3-pointer to put Fort Wayne up

videos.description: Fort Wayne's Kason Harrell gets a steal, which sets up John Konchar for the slam.
videos.headline: Kentucky turnover leads to Knochar dunk

videos.description: Kevin Knox drives to the basket and gets the lay-in, giving him six points in the first half vs. Fort Wayne.
videos.headline: Knox answers with a lay up

videos.description: John Calipari says switching to zone defense is what helped his team to get stops against Fort Wayne in the first half.
videos.headline: Calipari wants improvement in 2nd half vs. Fort Wayne

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander forces a turnover and finishes the play off with a dunk.
videos.headline: Gilgeous-Alexander gets steal and slam for Kentucky

videos.description: Nick Richards grabs an offensive board and puts it back up for a bucket giving him 25 points vs. Fort Wayne.
videos.headline: Richards reaches 25 points with lay-in

videos.description: Kentucky head coach John Calipari says he's pleased with the Wildcats' victory vs. Fort Wayne.
videos.headline: Richards' 25-point performance impresses Calipari

videos.description: Xzavier Taylor tries to chase down a loose ball and instinctively flops when he is near Kentucky head coach John Calipari on the sidelines.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Fort Wayne player tries to draw foul on Calipari) 2017/11/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Fort Wayne player tries to draw foul on Calipari

videos.description: Kentucky head coach John Calipari doesn't remember when it happened, but finds humor in the fact Xzavier Taylor trying to draw a foul off of him.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Presser (Calipari: Fort Wayne player smart for flop attempt) 2017/11/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Calipari: Fort Wayne player smart for flop attempt
